description: Test split for street view safety assessment

items.label: neutral
reasons: the environment is moderately safe during the day with sidewalks and light traffic
but outdated infrastructure and limited crossings keep safety low for pedestrians

items.label: moderately_safe
reasons: the sidewalks provides safe pedestrian path
but lack of crossings and visible lighting lowers the score

items.label: neutral
reasons: but missing sidewalks and no streetlights lower pedestrian safety significantly
